title: Embracing Fate
description: A Series of Fates: Book TwoSometimes you just have to embrace your fate. Seth has a secret: he has a crush on the human next door. His brilliant plan to meet Jack, the man of his dreams who happens to be an animal trainer? Take wolf form and ask his best friend, Max, to take him next door for training. Seth is the only one surprised when things go horribly awry.Still, can this shy wolf and a human meet their fate as mates?
author: C.C. Dado
